Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Diversey
ShortDescription: Eastbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Diversey.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
